Package com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.retrievalservice

An Intelligence Analysis Platform external data retrieval service provides clients with the ability to retrieve live information from an external data provider that has already been the subject of data acquisition.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IExternalDataRetrievalService A pair of methods for retrieving live data from an external data provider in a data acquisition solution.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.retrievalservice Description

An Intelligence Analysis Platform external data retrieval service provides clients with the ability to retrieve live information from an external data provider that has already been the subject of data acquisition.

The operations supported by an external data retrieval service are:

Web methodDescription
GetLatestItems Gets the latest versions of items that can be identified in an external data source using the provenance information that they contain.
GetContext Gets the latest versions of items that are related to items that can be identified in an external data source using the provenance information that they contain.

The data provider that an external data retrieval service interacts with does not have to be the direct subject of data acquisition. It is possible for the provenance information in an "acquired" item to refer to a source from which an intermediate provider took data.

Since:
4.0
